content: tenenbaum stocking cast on 60 stitches or any multiple of 10 stitches in the main color join in the round and work k2 p2 rib for 10 rounds work one knit round in the main color join in the contrasting color and work two repeats of the chart work a short-row heel in the main color work one more chart repeat for the foot-portion finish with a rounded toe in the main color kitchener stitch to close the toe break yarns and weave in ends
